item.title: 1 Holly Hill NW3, 2nd July
item.description:
Following works to 47 Heath Street to possibly add water connection; The kerb stone has been put back crooked and the pavement has been filled with bitumen instead of resin gravel, as every other utility company has done that have dug up this piece of pavement recently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holly Hill, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags left In bin cupboard with no bins, bins overflowing with no lids, 2nd July
item.description:
Outside 18 Nevill road has been a problem for years due to lack of suitable bins, two small bins currently overflowibg with no lids, rubbish bags in bin cupboard with no bins, bin cupboard has no doors so open to foxes, hot weather causing terrible smell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bike frames left, 2nd July
item.description:
Three bikes take up the bike space outside the pub. Two are just the frames and one doesnâ€™t have a seat. They have been here for over a year. I have filed a report in Feb and nothing has been done. Please can you action as taking up spots for our bikes

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allen Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken bottle by the roundabout, 2nd July
item.description:
Someone has smashed a glass bottle on the ground, I have found it this morning at approximately 7:50AM, and it wasn't there yesterday evening. I assume this happened overnight, I am concerned as many people walk their dogs along this road and it can be easy for them to get injured

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baldwyn's Park, Coldblow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
